about_the_game:
🎮 ToS Gamepad Companion - Add Custom Vibration Feedback to Any Game!

Transform your gaming experience by adding personalized vibration effects to your controller for any game—old or new! With ToS Gamepad Companion, you can assign custom vibrations to any button or trigger, enhancing immersion and bringing a new dimension to your gameplay.

🔥 Key Features:

  • 🎛️ Custom Vibration Mapping: Assign vibration effects to any button or trigger. For example, make your right trigger vibrate when pressed to simulate firing a weapon.
  • 💪 Adjustable Vibration Strength: Personalize the intensity of vibrations for each button to suit your preferences.
  • ⚙️ Motor Selection: Choose between low-frequency, high-frequency, or both motors for tailored feedback.
  • 📈 Dynamic Vibration Effects: Set vibrations to increase or decrease over time, adding depth to in-game actions.
  • ⏱️ Vibration Timing Controls: Control start and end delays for precise vibration timing.
  • 🔌 Automatic Gamepad Detection: Instantly recognizes your connected gamepad for hassle-free setup.
  • 🎯 Seamless Integration: Works alongside any game without interfering with gameplay.

ToS Gamepad Companion breathes new life into your favorite games by adding a tactile layer of interaction. Whether you're revisiting classics or diving into new releases, custom vibration feedback elevates your gaming to a whole new level.

🚀 Upgrade to ToS Gamepad Companion - Vibration Companion for the full experience, including access to all buttons and advanced features.

Note: The free version allows customization of face buttons only.

Don't miss out on enhancing your gaming sessions—download ToS Gamepad Companion today and feel the difference!
